name: Heaven Lost
description:
A shmup where everything has a health bar (including your own hearts). 

 Made for the Mini Jam #119. The theme was "Heaven" (yeah, I interpreted it in more or less the opposite way), under the limitation "Everything Can Die". 

 Inspirations: Shmup's in general, Milton's Paradise Lost (I've never read it however 🙂) & Delta Heavy's  White Flag Official Video, 

Credits

Font used  was the m6x11, by Daniel Linssen. Palette used was Pear36.

Software used:

  • Godot Engine v4.0 Beta 4;
  • Audacity v2.4.1;
  • Deflemask v0.12.1, module YM2151;
  • LibreSprite v1.0-dev;
  • LabChirp v1.60;
  • Screen To Gif 2.31;
  • GIMP v2.10.32.
